## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run the linter and fixed any issues

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the OpenAPI spec (if API changes were made)
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Database

- [ ] I have created necessary database migrations
- [ ] Migrations are backwards compatible
- [ ] Rollback plan documented

### Deployment

- [ ] This change requires environment variable updates (documented in PR description)
- [ ] This change requires infrastructure updates (documented in PR description)
- [ ] Deployment runbook updated (if needed)
